title: Vishnum38416
author: Vishnum38416
content: Can you suggest some cost free way to make bitcoins / Ethereum?

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: cost free? you can try faucets but in today's time, it is not worth It. try offering your skills/service online and get paid in Bitcoin, the forum has a "service" where you can post the service you offer. you can also try building up your account's rank and join signature campaigns, they can be time-consuming though.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: acroman08 on December 26, 2024, 11:45:40 PMcost free? you can try faucets but in today's time, it is not worth It. try offering your skills/service online and get paid in Bitcoin, the forum has a "service" where you can post the service you offer. you can also try building up your account's rank and join signature campaigns, they can be time-consuming though.I think faucets is the only free means to earn bitcoin that you talked about, but it is absolutely a waste of time and not worth it since many years ago. Also some faucets will only lead you to gambling sites. Others that you mentioned are means but not free means to earn bitcoin because you have time and energy to sacrifice. I will also advice him to try to be on this forum, post and rank up to join a signature campaign.

comments.author: odolvlobo
comments.body: Quote from: Vishnum38416 on December 26, 2024, 11:23:48 PMCan you suggest some cost free way to make bitcoins / Ethereum? Show me a cost-free way to make money, and I show you a cost-free way to make bitcoins.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: Vishnum38416 on December 26, 2024, 11:23:48 PMCan you suggest some cost free way to make bitcoins / Ethereum? There is no "free way" to make Bitcoins/Ethereum or money, unless if you want to tell me that you want to be a scammer. Even scammers spend some time to develop their scam. Anything you invest your time into is not free because unlike the money you are trying to make, you can not replace the time you have lost. Once it's gone, it's gone forever.Even those so-called faucets require your time resource, internet connection, device etc.Use the time you have to learn something that can later help you earn

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: Quote from: Vishnum38416 on December 26, 2024, 11:23:48 PMCan you suggest some cost free way to make bitcoins / Ethereum? Free ways are faucets but faucets nowadays are not generous like years ago.You can claim cryptocurrency, Bitcoin, Ethereum, altcoins from faucets, but it is wasteful and you can use your time to learn, find jobs, work, and get money. When you have good income, you can use it for investment.Free lunches usually are not too much.Cryptocurrency Job List

comments.author: MarjorieZimmermanGinger
comments.body: Quote from: Vishnum38416 on December 26, 2024, 11:23:48 PMCan you suggest some cost free way to make bitcoins / Ethereum? There is no maximum way to get free bitcoins now and even if there is such as a faucet will not give you any profit because it is not worth it. It is better for you to allocate a sufficient budget to buy and use the DCA method as a step because even though the availability of money you have is small, this pattern is much better than expecting something free now. Bitcoin is already so valuable that something that is obtained for free will certainly not provide an amount that is commensurate with what we expect.

comments.author: hypersonic1
comments.body: I don't know your situation, but truly, a few hundred dollars can allow you to stake some coins, or arbitrage trade and gain some momentum that will snow ball.If you're not in the US and you are ok with custodial services you can make a percentage with your holdings on the side.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: hypersonic1 on December 27, 2024, 06:22:55 AMI don't know your situation, but truly, a few hundred dollars can allow you to stake some coins, or arbitrage trade and gain some momentum that will snow ball.Not that arbitrage trading is not risky. Huge amount of money is required for it and the price might against the trader at times. Also I think OP is looking for free way that will not require money at all.Quote from: hypersonic1 on December 27, 2024, 06:22:55 AMIf you're not in the US and you are ok with custodial services you can make a percentage with your holdings on the side.No to custodial service. The only reason people should use them is to trade and nothing should be more than that. There are hacks and money misappropriation that lead to people losing money in the past as they have money on exchanges. Examples are Mt. Gox, Cryptopia and FTX. Read about these exchanges that have folded up.

comments.author: betswift
comments.body: Quote from: acroman08 on December 26, 2024, 11:45:40 PMcost free? you can try faucets but in today's time, it is not worth It. try offering your skills/service online and get paid in Bitcoin, the forum has a "service" where you can post the service you offer. you can also try building up your account's rank and join signature campaigns, they can be time-consuming though.Also, there would probably be lots of scam in faucet area today - so be wary and vigilant, OP, and follow the advice by acroman.

comments.author: Franctoshi
comments.body: Quote from: Vishnum38416 on December 26, 2024, 11:23:48 PMCan you suggest some cost free way to make bitcoins / Ethereum? The days of free Bitcoin is gone, and most of the sites that offer free Bitcoin no longer do so when Bitcoin became expensive, now the only way to earn Bitcoin is to offer a service in some website that will in return pay u in Bitcoin,  and Bitcointalk is one of it where you can render such service, grow your account and contribute positively to the community and join a signature campaign, then you will be rewarded with some Bitcoin, and other than that you now have to purchase Bitcoin.

comments.author: john_egbert
comments.body: Quote from: Franctoshi on December 27, 2024, 08:14:47 AMQuote from: Vishnum38416 on December 26, 2024, 11:23:48 PMCan you suggest some cost free way to make bitcoins / Ethereum? The days of free Bitcoin is gone, and most of the sites that offer free Bitcoin no longer do so when Bitcoin became expensive, now the only way to earn Bitcoin is to offer a service in some website that will in return pay u in Bitcoin,  and Bitcointalk is one of it where you can render such service, grow your account and contribute positively to the community and join a signature campaign, then you will be rewarded with some Bitcoin, and other than that you now have to purchase Bitcoin. The best way out would to have a stable job + some side hustle, that would contribute to accumulating Bitcoin too.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: You can visit freebitco.in and play with their faucet. Collect the faucet until it reach the minimum amount to withdraw and withdraw it to your wallet. Then you can sell your satoshi to fiat so you don't spend any money except your internet connection.Besides that, you can offer your skill in the freelance website so you can earn money by doing the task. Collect that money for a while so you can buy Bitcoin or Ethereum. Repeat the process and you will have more money to buy Bitcoin

comments.author: betswift
comments.body: Quote from: michellee on December 27, 2024, 09:56:22 AMYou can visit freebitco.in and play with their faucet. Collect the faucet until it reach the minimum amount to withdraw and withdraw it to your wallet. Then you can sell your satoshi to fiat so you don't spend any money except your internet connection.Besides that, you can offer your skill in the freelance website so you can earn money by doing the task. Collect that money for a while so you can buy Bitcoin or Ethereum. Repeat the process and you will have more money to buy BitcoinInterestingly enough, is there a freelance platform that would pay up in BTC from the get-go?Never thought about it.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: hypersonic1 on December 27, 2024, 06:22:55 AMI don't know your situation, but truly, a few hundred dollars can allow you to stake some coins, or arbitrage trade and gain some momentum that will snow ball.What you are talking about is trading and in trading like arbitrage you need to also have money or capital that you want to invest in exchange for the coins you want to sell or hodl if that is what you want. If you are also converting, you also would do that when you have a start up capital but op is asking for free btc without having to put any dine into it. There is no free meal anywhere and he has to be sure that faucets are now waste of time. Therefore, to learn a skill or service that he can render and get rewarded in btc is the fastest source he can gain btc for his service or he can work to enter a signature campaign. Whichever, he has to make effort because nothing is for free.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on December 26, 2024, 11:50:21 PMQuote from: acroman08 on December 26, 2024, 11:45:40 PMcost free? you can try faucets but in today's time, it is not worth It. try offering your skills/service online and get paid in Bitcoin, the forum has a "service" where you can post the service you offer. you can also try building up your account's rank and join signature campaigns, they can be time-consuming though.I think faucets is the only free means to earn bitcoin that you talked about, but it is absolutely a waste of time and not worth it since many years ago. Also some faucets will only lead you to gambling sites. Others that you mentioned are means but not free means to earn bitcoin because you have time and energy to sacrifice. I will also advice him to try to be on this forum, post and rank up to join a signature campaign.I guess you're right but then again, the things I mentioned are probably the closest the OP can get to a "cost free" Bitcoin as he/she can earn from it without spending a lot of money.

comments.author: FortuneFollower
comments.body: Quote from: Gozie51 on December 27, 2024, 10:27:18 AMQuote from: hypersonic1 on December 27, 2024, 06:22:55 AMI don't know your situation, but truly, a few hundred dollars can allow you to stake some coins, or arbitrage trade and gain some momentum that will snow ball.What you are talking about is trading and in trading like arbitrage you need to also have money or capital that you want to invest in exchange for the coins you want to sell or hodl if that is what you want. If you are also converting, you also would do that when you have a start up capital but op is asking for free btc without having to put any dine into it. There is no free meal anywhere and he has to be sure that faucets are now waste of time. Therefore, to learn a skill or service that he can render and get rewarded in btc is the fastest source he can gain btc for his service or he can work to enter a signature campaign. Whichever, he has to make effort because nothing is for free.Agreed. The days where the faucets were viable are gone, basically - it's better to find a target for OP and strike at it, become better at it, and be rewarded for it with Bitcoin (ideally).

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Nothing is free, even if there is still a faucet it will not be as valuable as maybe you only get a few satoshis, but it cannot be withdrawn to your wallet.Airdrops may be a way to earn extra income and they are still free (although some airdrops require capital) but if you work hard at researching airdrops you will find this extra way.Now there are so many ways to earn depending on your skills, many sites provide a way to get there.

comments.author: Alone055
comments.body: Quote from: betswift on December 27, 2024, 09:59:27 AMInterestingly enough, is there a freelance platform that would pay up in BTC from the get-go?Never thought about it. These are a few that are currently operational:1. LaborX2. BitGigs3. BitcoinJobs4. CryptoTask5. Latium6. Deelance7. CoinlancerThe list might include platforms where crypto-related jobs are posted, which can be done onsite, but most are freelance platforms that pay in cryptocurrencies.@OP, you can try offering your services on these platforms if you have any skills. You won't need to spend money, but you can earn money only if you have something you can sell; it can be a skill or a service.

comments.author: Rockstarguy
comments.body: Quote from: Vishnum38416 on December 26, 2024, 11:23:48 PMCan you suggest some cost free way to make bitcoins / Ethereum? Their is no free bitcoin and if you have this understanding to know about no free bitcoin it will really help you not to fall into the hands of scammers. Many newbies have been deceived they could get free money and bitcoin and this has always been used as a strategy by scammers to get people who have this mindset. Anything that is valuable you work for it for you to gain access to it. For you to possess some bitcoin it is either you buy with your own money or you earn bitcoin by working for a service. During the time bitcoin was created then you could get bitcoin by mining on your computer device but right now you an get it for free. No free bitcoin,  you can buy and go into a longterm investment which you will make good profit from it.
